trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> implementação para que você pode usar o padrão "ouvinte de evento fraco" anexar ouvintes para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Para ser ouvintes nesse padrão, os objetos de ouvinte devem implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>na classe que é a origem dos eventos.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o manipulador de eventos especificado, o que é chamado quando a origem especificada gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged> event..
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para especificar o manipulador de eventos que você deseja usar para assinar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged>evento...</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esse método, o objeto de escuta não precisa implementar o <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>interface.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified listener to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o ouvinte especificado para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado como um ouvinte.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um novo objeto para conter ouvintes para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto para conter ouvintes para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos especificado da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O representante que manipula o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o ouvinte especificado do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: O ouvinte a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos sobre a origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Paradas de escuta para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanged"> </xref> eventos sobre a origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.
